properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(NOTICE_CATEGORY = CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT CATEGORY_NAME, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
